query.name: us.ct.k12.tolland.identimetrics.students.get_import_data
query.sql: select unique students.last_name, students.first_name, students.middle_name, students.student_number, schools.abbreviation, students.grade_level, schools.school_number from students join schools on students.schoolid = schools.School_Number where students.enroll_status = 0 ORDER BY abbreviation,grade_level,last_name,first_name,middle_name

query.name: us.ct.k12.tolland.identimetrics.staff.get_import_data
query.sql: select unique users.last_name, users.first_name, users.middle_name, users.teachernumber, schools.abbreviation, 'Staff' as "level2", schools.school_number from users join schools on users.HomeSchoolID = schools.School_Number join schoolstaff on users.dcid = schoolstaff.Users_DCID where schoolstaff.StaffStatus = 1 ORDER BY abbreviation,last_name,first_name,middle_name
